entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as the one who is hosting the event and has two champions. He is also referred to by Professor Karkaroff.

entities.name: karkaroff
entities.description: Karkaroff is a professor who is questioning Dumbledore about having two champions.

entities.name: madame maxime
entities.description: Madame Maxime is mentioned as someone who agrees with Karkaroff that it's impossible for there to be two champions.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is being comforted by Madame Maxime.

relationships.description: Karkaroff is questioning Dumbledore about having two champions.
Karkaroff is accusing Dumbledore of not following the rules.
Madame Maxime agrees with Karkaroff that it's impossible for there to be two champions.
